chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
R: stack nat
y0: string
x0: string

Goal:
$ <> #

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
stack = fun X : Type => list (card X) : Type -> Type Arguments stack _%type_scope
string = SR.string nat : Type
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : Fin.t ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [R : stack nat x0 : string y0 : string |- nat]
PCP_facts.sym = fix sym (R : stack nat) : list nat := match R with | [] => [] | x / y :: R0 => x ++ y ++ sym R0 end : stack nat -> list nat
itau1_app : forall A B : list nat, itau1 ?P (A ++ B) = itau1 ?P A ++ itau1 ?P B where ?X : [R : stack nat x0 : string y0 : string |- Type] ?P : [R : stack nat x0 : string y0 : string |- stack ?X]
itau2_app : forall A B : list nat, itau2 ?P (A ++ B) = itau2 ?P A ++ itau2 ?P B where ?X : [R : stack nat x0 : string y0 : string |- Type] ?P : [R : stack nat x0 : string y0 : string |- stack ?X]
EnumerabilityFacts.enumerator__T_prod : forall (f1 : nat -> option ?X) (f2 : nat -> option ?Y), EnumerabilityFacts.enumerator__T' ?X f1 -> EnumerabilityFacts.enumerator__T' ?Y f2 -> EnumerabilityFacts.enumerator__T' (?X * ?Y) (EnumerabilityFacts.prod_enum f1 f2) where ?X : [R : stack nat x0 : string y0 : string |- Type] ?Y : [R : stack nat x0 : string y0 : string |- Type]
MPCP = fun '(x / y / P) => exists A : stack nat, A <<= x / y :: P /\ x ++ tau1 A = y ++ tau2 A : card nat * stack nat -> Prop
PCP = PCPX : stack nat -> Prop
tau2_app : forall A B : stack ?X, tau2 (A ++ B) = tau2 A ++ tau2 B where ?X : [R : stack nat x0 : string y0 : string |- Type]
tau1_app : forall A B : stack ?X, tau1 (A ++ B) = tau1 A ++ tau1 B where ?X : [R : stack nat x0 : string y0 : string |- Type]
der_sing : forall (P : stack ?X) (x y : list ?X), x / y el P -> derivable P x y where ?X : [R : stack nat x0 : string y0 : string |- Type]
PCPX = fun (X : Type) (P : stack X) => exists A : list (card X), A <<= P /\ A <> [] /\ tau1 A = tau2 A : forall X : Type, stack X -> Prop Arguments PCPX {X}%type_scope
ListEnumerabilityFacts.enumerator__T_list : forall L : nat -> list ?X, ListEnumerabilityFacts.list_enumerator__T' ?X L -> ListEnumerabilityFacts.list_enumerator__T' (list ?X) (ListEnumerabilityFacts.L_list L) where ?X : [R : stack nat x0 : string y0 : string |- Type]
iPCPb = fun P : stack bool => exists A : list nat, (forall a : nat, a el A -> a < | P |) /\ A <> [] /\ itau1 P A = itau2 P A : stack bool -> Prop
der_cons : forall (P : stack ?X) (x y : list ?X) (u v : PCP.string ?X), x / y el P -> derivable P u v -> derivable P (x ++ u) (y ++ v) where ?X : [R : stack nat x0 : string y0 : string |- Type]
Znat.neq = fun x y : nat => x <> y : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Znat.neq (_ _)%nat_scope
itau2 = fix itau2 (X : Type) (P : stack X) (A : list nat) {struct A} : PCP.string X := match A with | [] => [] | i :: A0 => snd (nth i P ([] / [])) ++ itau2 X P A0 end : forall X : Type, stack X -> list nat -> PCP.string X Arguments itau2 {X}%type_scope _ _%list_scope
itau1 = fix itau1 (X : Type) (P : stack X) (A : list nat) {struct A} : PCP.string X := match A with | [] => [] | i :: A0 => fst (nth i P ([] / [])) ++ itau1 X P A0 end : forall X : Type, stack X -> list nat -> PCP.string X Arguments itau1 {X}%type_scope _ _%list_scope
nat_eq_dec = fun x y : nat => nat_rec (fun x0 : nat => forall x1 : nat, {x0 = x1} + {x0 <> x1}) (fun x0 : nat => match x0 as n return ({0 = n} + {0 <> n}) with | 0 => left eq_refl | S n => right (fun H : 0 = S n => let H0 : False := eq_ind 0 (fun e : nat => match e with | 0 => True | S _ => False end) I (S n) H in False_ind False H0) end) (fun (n : nat) (H : forall x0 : nat, {n = x0} + {n <> x0}) (x0 : nat) => match x0 as n0 return ({S n = n0} + {S n <> n0}) with | 0 => right (fun H0 : S n = 0 => let H1 : False := eq_ind (S n) (fun e : nat => match e with | 0 => False | S _ => True end) I 0 H0...
count_occ : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list A -> A -> nat
count_occ' : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list A -> A -> nat
pos : forall X : Type, (forall x y : X, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> X -> list X -> option nat
stack_discrete = let H : forall X : Type, inhabited (eq_dec X) -> DecidabilityFacts.discrete X := fun X : Type => match DecidabilityFacts.discrete_iff X with | conj _ x0 => x0 end in H (stack bool) (inhabits (fun x y : stack bool => list_rect (fun x0 : list (card bool) => forall x1 : stack bool, {x0 = x1} + {x0 <> x1}) (fun x0 : stack bool => match x0 as l return ({[] = l} + {[] <> l}) with | [] => left eq_refl | c :: l => right (fun H0 : [] = c :: l => let H1 : False := eq_ind [] (fun e : stack bool => match e with | [] => True | _ :: _ => False end) I (c :: l) H0 in False_ind False H1) end) (fun (a : card bool) (l : list (card bool)) (X : forall x0 : stack bool, {l = x0} + {l <> x0}) (x0...
dPCP = fun (X : Type) (P : stack X) => exists u : PCP.string X, derivable P u u : forall X : Type, stack X -> Prop Arguments dPCP {X}%type_scope
MPCPb = fun '(x / y / P) => exists A : stack bool, A <<= x / y :: P /\ x ++ tau1 A = y ++ tau2 A : card bool * stack bool -> Prop
PCPb = PCPX : stack bool -> Prop
dPCPb = dPCP : stack bool -> Prop
enumerable_PCP = let H : enumerable (fun '(C / (u / v)) => derivable C u v) := enumerable_derivable in let H0 : enumerable (fun '(_ / (s / t)) => s = t) := EnumerabilityFacts.dec_count_enum (let H0 : forall (X : Type) (p : X -> Prop), inhabited (forall x : X, dec (p x)) -> decidable p := fun (X : Type) (p : X -> Prop) => match DecidabilityFacts.decidable_iff X p with | conj _ x0 => x0 end in H0 (stack bool * (PCP.string bool * PCP.string bool))%type (fun '(_ / (s / t)) => s = t) (inhabits (fun x : stack bool * (PCP.string bool * PCP.string bool) => let (_, p) as p return (dec (let '_ / (s / t) := p in s = t)) := x in let (s0, s1) as p0 return (dec (let 's0 / t := p0 in s0 = t...
tau1 = fix tau1 (X : Type) (A : stack X) {struct A} : PCP.string X := match A with | [] => [] | x / _ :: A0 => x ++ tau1 X A0 end : forall X : Type, stack X -> PCP.string X Arguments tau1 {X}%type_scope
tau2 = fix tau2 (X : Type) (A : stack X) {struct A} : PCP.string X := match A with | [] => [] | _ / y :: A0 => y ++ tau2 X A0 end : forall X : Type, stack X -> PCP.string X Arguments tau2 {X}%type_scope
tau2_sym : forall A : stack nat, tau2 A <<= PCP_facts.sym A
tau1_sym : forall A : stack nat, tau1 A <<= PCP_facts.sym A
PCP_facts.sym_mono : forall A P : stack nat, A <<= P -> PCP_facts.sym A <<= PCP_facts.sym P
cBPCP : forall (P : stack bool) (u : PCP.string bool), derivable P u u -> BPCP P
PCP_facts.sym_app : forall P R : stack nat, PCP_facts.sym (P ++ R) = PCP_facts.sym P ++ PCP_facts.sym R
PCP_facts.sym_word_R : forall (R : stack nat) (u v : list nat), u / v el R -> v <<= PCP_facts.sym R
PCP_facts.sym_word_l : forall (R : stack nat) (u v : list nat), u / v el R -> u <<= PCP_facts.sym R
Inductive BPCP (P : stack bool) : Prop := cBPCP : forall u : PCP.string bool, derivable P u u -> BPCP P
PeanoNat.Nat.clearbit = fun a n : nat => PeanoNat.Nat.ldiff a (PeanoNat.Nat.shiftl 1 n) : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments PeanoNat.Nat.clearbit (_ _)%nat_scope
BPCP_ind : forall (P : stack bool) (P0 : Prop), (forall u : PCP.string bool, derivable P u u -> P0) -> BPCP P -> P0
BPCP_sind : forall (P : stack bool) (P0 : SProp), (forall u : PCP.string bool, derivable P u u -> P0) -> BPCP P -> P0
